About the Malibu Resort

We are a family oriented, quaint, vintage, mom and pop resort. Our tranquil grounds host a beautiful 20x40 heated pool with a nice grassy area for relaxing and large wet deck for tanning. Enjoy our free WIFI, pets are welcome (with restrictions) charcoal grill area, registered guests may also enjoy a game of cornhole with your family & friends. Bean Bags are available for checkout at the front desk. Keep in mind shopping is within walking distance, or you may take the Trolley down to the Famous John's Pass, restaurants, etc.. that you would like to visit during your stay! A public playground/basketball court is just across the street and we are only 500 steps from the sparkling Gulf waters! 24 hour resident managers available for your assistance. Meet "Kokomo" the resident Blue & Gold Macaw you may also take home a free picture with her if you choose to!

Room Options

  • Motel Room
  • Studio
  • One Bedroom Apartment

Our motel rooms sleep up to two guests. One or two beds, cable television, mini refrigerator, bathroom with tub/shower combo, closet, a/c and heat, ceiling fan.

Property Amenities

  • Heated pool
  • Onsite restaurant
  • Across from beach
  • Shuffle board
  • Wifi
  • Cable TV
  • Close to clearwater and st pete beach

Our studio rooms sleep up to 4 guests. One or two beds, stove top (2 burner), refrigerator/freezer, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, dishes, small dining table/chairs, cable television, bathroom with tub/shower combo, closet, a/c and heat, ceiling fan

Property Amenities

  • Heated pool
  • Onsite restaurant
  • Across from beach
  • Shuffle board
  • Wifi
  • Cable TV
  • Close to clearwater and st pete beach

Our one bedroom apartment sleeps up to 4 guests. Living area with sleeper sofa, cable television, small dining area with table/chairs, kitchen (stove top, refrigerator/freezer, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, dishes), one queen bed in bedroom, ceiling fan.

Property Amenities

  • Heated pool
  • Onsite restaurant
  • Across from beach
  • Shuffle board
  • Wifi
  • Cable TV
  • Close to clearwater and st pete beach
